name: Dark Sweeper
description:
Dark Sweeper - a shooter about a soldier, which takes place in the wastelands filled with various creatures and marauders. You are a young corporal sent to a military operation, your task is to defeat the enemies.

You will find yourself in a dangerous area, completely alone. Find the right weapon and go to destroy your enemies. But remember you must stay alive.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Nice soundtrack
- Lots of levels
